alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 21 at 12:29AM AKDT until July 21 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a High Surf Advisory, which is in effect from 5 AM early this morning to 10 PM AKDT this evening. * LOCATION...Kotlik to Hooper Bay. * TIMING...Thursday morning to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Objects left on the beach could be washed away. Minor beach erosion will occur. * WAVE AND SURF...Sea levels will rise 2 to 3 feet above the normal high tides. Waves will wash up to the top of the beach.
info.instruction: A High Surf Advisory means that localized beach erosion is expected. Precautions should be taken to protect property.
